org.apache.ambari.server.topology

Class ClusterTopologyImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ambari.server.topology.ClusterTopologyImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ClusterTopology

    public class ClusterTopologyImpl
extends Object
implements ClusterTopology
    Represents a cluster topology. Topology includes the the associated blueprint, cluster configuration and hostgroup -> host mapping.

      • addHostToTopology

        public void addHostToTopology(String hostGroupName,
                              String host)
                       throws InvalidTopologyException,
                              NoSuchHostGroupException
        Description copied from interface: ClusterTopology
        Add a new host to the topology.
        Specified by:
        addHostToTopology in interface ClusterTopology
        Parameters:
        hostGroupName - name of associated host group
        host - name of host
        Throws:
        InvalidTopologyException - if the host being added is already registered to a different host group
        NoSuchHostGroupException - if the specified host group is invalid

      • getHostAssignmentsForComponent

        public Collection<String> getHostAssignmentsForComponent(String component)
        Description copied from interface: ClusterTopology
        Get all hosts which are mapped to a host group which contains the specified component. The host need only to be mapped to the hostgroup, not actually provisioned.
        Specified by:
        getHostAssignmentsForComponent in interface ClusterTopology
        Parameters:
        component - component name
        Returns:
        collection of hosts for the specified component; will not return null
